textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Susie Crippen introduced her eponymous brand, Crippen, after leaving the contemporary powerhouse J Brand. Inspired by a single-suitcase trip around the world, each collection seeks to simplify and flatter the well-traveled woman’s wardrobe. Since spring 2013, the line’s airy silhouettes have dazzled fashion journalists and bloggers around the world. Crippen’s fresh vision of casualwear has been lauded in the pages of Elle, Harper’s Bazaar, and Nylon, offering a versatile, sophisticated aesthetic.
